means: [女子名] 默特尔来源于希腊语，含义是“番樱桃”(myrtle)
[地名] [加拿大、美国] 默特尔

sentence.Network_en: He started for Dot's bedroom and Myrtle held him back.
sentence.Network_cn: 他正要去多特的卧室，被默特尔拦住了。

sentence.Network_en: Myrtle sat huddled on the side of the bed, weeping.
sentence.Network_cn: 默特尔缩着身子坐在床边哭泣。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin myrtilla, myrtillus, diminutive of Latin myrta, myrtus, from Greek murtos

means.word_mean: 1. widely cultivated as a groundcover for its dark green shiny leaves and usually blue-violet flowers
2. any evergreen shrub or tree of the genus Myrtus
